entries.meaning: (Australian Aboriginal mythology) A kind of primordial living entity created by Yhi and Bunjil from Baiame's body.
(Australia, cryptozoology) An ape-like monster or animal said to exist in parts of eastern Australia. [from 20th c.]
examples: The white population claimed that an escaped panther from a travelling circus was the culprit; others thought that a Yowie was responsible.
